history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to Children's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER I'm leaving from CMU.
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER I'm traveling at 6 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 06:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 22 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes, continue.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Craig Streetat Park Plaza. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 54 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Main Streetat Penn avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 6:15pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Yes, I'm finished.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4401 Penn avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Yes, continue.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
